word_mean: 专家，专科医师：对某一学科如内科或外科的特殊分支有专门研究和实际经验的医师，尤指经高级培养由专门委员会批准授予其专项资格证书的

sentence.Network_en: Specialist subjects are full of pitfalls for the unwary.
sentence.Network_cn: 专业学科充满陷阱，专套粗心大意的人。

means.word_mean: 专家,权威,内行,能手,老手

entry.def: A specialist is a person who has a particular skill or knows a lot about a particular subject.

example.ex: If you are housebound, you can arrange for a home visit from a specialist adviser...
example.tran: 如果你出不了门，可以预约专家顾问上门就诊。

example.ex: Peckham, himself a cancer specialist, is well aware of the wide variations in medical practice.
example.tran: 佩卡姆本人是一名癌症专家，他非常了解不同治疗方法之间的巨大差异。

means.word_mean: 1. an expert who is devoted to one occupation or branch of learning

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Each is like a specialist news feed in itself.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+specific特有的→共同特有的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+al……的→adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 明确的,具体的;特定的,特有的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+fic→具体的,特有的
e+special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]→adj.特别的, 特殊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 似是而非的,华而不实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+ous……的→外观相似而实质不同
especial[adj.特别的, 特殊的]+ly表副词→adv.特别, 尤其
special特殊的,专门的+ist专家或人→n.专门医师, 专家
special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]+ity表名词→n.[specialty]特性,性质;专业/长;特产
speci外观,种类,特别+es表复数→[所有]种类
specific[adj.明确的,具体的;特定的,特有的]+ation表名词→n.详述;[常n.]规格,说明书,规范
speci外观,种类,特别+men表物品→n.标本,样本
special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]+ize化→v.[specialise][in]专攻,专门研究,专业化

stems_affixes.value_cn: 指定, 详细说明, 列入清单
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+ify表动词→specify规类→指定, 列入清单

Sentence.sentence: Those who stay on for an additional two years can earn a master's degree that qualifies them as nurse practitioners (执业护士) or clinical nurse specialists.
The independence created by philosophical insight is—in my opinion—the mark of distinction between a mere artisan (工匠) or specialist and a real seeker after truth," Einstein wrote in 1944.

sentences.en: She is a specialist in English.
The local doctor couldn't tell what was wrong, so he sent her to see a specialist.
sentences.cn: 当地医生未能诊断出她是什么病, 所以他叫她去看专科医生。

jushi.english: She is a specialist in English.
The local doctor couldn't tell what was wrong, so he sent her to see a specialist.
jushi.chinese: 当地医生未能诊断出她是什么病,所以他叫她去看专科医生。
